casebody.data:
UNITED STATES of America, Plaintiff-Ap-pellee, v. Morris FRIEDBERG, Defendant-Appellant. No. 282, Docket 22729. United States Court of Appeals Second Circuit. Argued June 4, 1953. Decided June 4, 1953. Henry K. Chapman, New York City, for defendant-appellant. J. Edward Lumbard, Jr., U. S. Atty. for Southern District of New York, New York City (James V. Ryan, Asst. U. S. Atty., New York City, of counsel), for plaintiff-appellee.

Before AUGUSTUS N. HAND, CHASE and CLARK, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Judgment affirmed in open court.
